# amalitech-tab-panel



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                         | Type             | Default |
| ---------- | ---------- | ----------------------------------- | ---------------- | ------- |
| `disabled` | `disabled` | When true, tab cannot be activated. | `boolean`        | `false` |
| `selected` | `selected` | Defines if tab is active.           | `boolean`        | `false` |
| `tabName`  | `tab-name` | Title of the tabPanel.              | `null \| string` | `null`  |
